List videos with filtering, search, and pagination

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"in":"query","name":"playlistId","required":false,"description":"Filter by playlist ID"},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"search","required":false,"description":"Search in title and description"},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"in":"query","name":"tags","required":false,"description":"Filter by tags"},{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["UNWATCHED","WATCHING","COMPLETED"]},"in":"query","name":"status","required":false,"description":"Filter by watch status"},{"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1},"in":"query","name":"page","required":false,"description":"Page number"},{"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":20},"in":"query","name":"limit","required":false,"description":"Items per page"},{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["title","publishedAt","duration","viewCount"]},"in":"query","name":"sortBy","required":false,"description":"Sort field"},{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["asc","desc"],"default":"desc"},"in":"query","name":"sortOrder","required":false,"description":"Sort order"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
